        <script id="yelp-js-error-reporting-init-error-reporting" type="application/json">{"apiKey": "3bcc88b22786c51bccbd0aa17ca34bc5", "enabled": true, "config": {"blacklist": {"location": ["yl[a-z]-[a-z]*\\.js"], "message": ["Blocked a frame with origin"], "type": []}, "metaData": {"projectName": "homepage"}, "url": "/home", "sampleRate": 0.5, "release": "818a1800120e161c7d243a93c03b1ea45ae56353", "environment": "prod"}}</script>

        <script>(function (d, w) {
    var supportsSVG = (
        !!d.createElementNS &&
        !!d.createElementNS(
            'http://www.w3.org/2000/svg',
            'svg'
        ).createSVGRect
    );
    var cdnPath = 'https://s3-media4.fl.yelpcdn.com/assets/srv0/svg_icons/cd3a28ad6947/assets/svg_sprite.js';
    var head = d.getElementsByTagName('head')[0];
    function fallback() {
        var link = d.createElement('link');
        link.rel = 'stylesheet';
        link.href = 'https://s3-media3.fl.yelpcdn.com/assets/srv0/svg_icons/6e3f5c9c8ae9/assets/sprite.css';
        head.appendChild(link);
    }
    if (!supportsSVG) {
        fallback();
        return;
    }
    if (!w.yelp) {
        w.yelp = {};
    }
    w.yelp.__injectSvgSpritesheet = function (svg) {
        document.body.insertAdjacentHTML('afterbegin', svg);
        delete window.yelp.__injectSvgSpritesheet;
    }
    function onError() {
        d.documentElement.className = [
            d.documentElement.className,
            'icon-svg-unavailable'
        ].join(' ');
        fallback();
        return true;
    }
    var script = d.createElement('script');
    script.async = true;
    script.onerror = onError;
    script.src = cdnPath + '?callback=window.yelp.__injectSvgSpritesheet';
    head.appendChild(script);
}(document, window));</script>

        <div class="hero-header js-main-header">
            <div class="arrange arrange--18">
                <div class="arrange_unit arrange_unit--fill">
                        <div class="hero-header_nav hero-header_nav--main nowrap">
                                    <ul class="header-nav" id="header-nav">
                <li id="write-review" class="header-nav_item js-analytics-click" data-analytics-label="write-review">
                        <a class="header-nav_link" href="/writeareview">
                            Beitrag schreiben
                        </a>
                </li>
                <li id="events" class="header-nav_item js-analytics-click" data-analytics-label="events">
                        <a class="header-nav_link" href="/events">
                            Events
                        </a>
                </li>

                            Forum
                        </a>
                </li>
        </ul>

                        </div>
                </div>

                            <ul class="header-nav hero-header_nav main-header_account">
        <li class="header-nav_item u-space-r2" id="header-log-in">

    <div class="y-container ">
        <div class="y-container_content">
            <div class="home-container">
                

                    <div class="home-container_section home-container_section--top-long">
        <h2 class="activity-feed_title u-text-centered">Yelp-News</h2>
        <div class="js-activity-feed u-space-t4" data-feed-type="nearby">
            <div class="arrange arrange--wrap arrange--3-units arrange--30">
                <div class="arrange_unit js-column-a"></div>
                <div class="arrange_unit js-column-b"></div>
                <div class="arrange_unit js-column-c"></div>
            </div>
                <p class="js-load-more activity-feed_load-more">
        <a class="js-analytics-click"
            href="javascript:;"
            data-analytics-label="see-more-recent-activity">

            <span aria-hidden="true" style="width: 24px; height: 24px;" class="icon icon--24-chevron-down icon--size-24 icon--currentColor u-space-r-half">
    <svg class="icon_svg">
        <use xlink:href="#24x24_chevron_down" />
    </svg>
</span><span class="js-load-more-text"
                data-text-with-location="Weitere Aktivität in Berlin anzeigen"
                data-text-without-location="Weitere Aktivität anzeigen">Weitere Aktivität in Berlin anzeigen</span>
        </a>
    </p>

            <div class="js-burst-loader-container u-text-centered">
                    <span class="burst-loader-small js-burst-loader-small hidden">
        
    </span>

            </div>
                <div class="activity-feed-error u-text-centered u-hidden js-empty-feed-error">
        <img class="empty-state-asset"
            src="https://s3-media2.fl.yelpcdn.com/assets/srv0/homepage/10ea4aedcdab/assets/img/home/construction_darwin.png" srcset="https://s3-media3.fl.yelpcdn.com/assets/srv0/homepage/6a8ec4cbd454/assets/img/home/construction_darwin@2x.png 2x" width="160"
            alt="" />
        <h3 class="u-space-b1">
            Wir konnten leider keine aktuellen Aktivitäten laden.
        </h3>
        <p>
            Keine Sorgen - wir kümmern uns darum, und melden uns in Kürze.
        </p>
    </div>

        </div>
    </div>

                <div class="home-container_section home-container_section--top-long">
                        <div class="u-text-centered">
        <h2 class="u-space-b4">Yelp-Apps</h2>
        <div class="app-pitch">
            <div class="arrange arrange--equal arrange--30">
                <div class="arrange_unit">
                    <a href="http://itunes.apple.com/DE/app/yelp/id284910350?mt=8&amp;uo=4" class="island island-light app-pitch_item app-pitch_item--ios icon--hover-linked icon--active-linked icon">
                        <h4>iPhone, iPad und <span aria-hidden="true" style="width: 18px; height: 18px;" class="icon icon--18-apple icon--size-18 icon--black">
    <svg class="icon_svg">
        <use xlink:href="#18x18_apple" />
    </svg>
</span>Watch</h4>
                        <img
                            src="https://s3-media2.fl.yelpcdn.com/assets/srv0/yelp_styleguide/960cce5c1917/assets/img/app_pitch/pitch_ios.png" srcset="https://s3-media2.fl.yelpcdn.com/assets/srv0/yelp_styleguide/56ec6655a7ac/assets/img/app_pitch/pitch_ios@2x.png 2x" width="264"
                            alt=iPhone, iPad and AppleWatch />
                    </a>
                </div>
                <div class="arrange_unit">
                    <a href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yelp.android&amp;referrer=utm_source%3Dyelp-web%26utm_medium%3Dhome%26utm_campaign%3Dyelpmobile&amp;hl=de" class="island island-light app-pitch_item app-pitch_item--android">
                        <h4>Android</h4>
                        <img
                            src="https://s3-media2.fl.yelpcdn.com/assets/srv0/yelp_styleguide/a91a4a087787/assets/img/app_pitch/pitch_android.png" srcset="https://s3-media4.fl.yelpcdn.com/assets/srv0/yelp_styleguide/c0e32a3afc51/assets/img/app_pitch/pitch_android@2x.png 2x" width="264"
                            alt="Android" />
                    </a>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

            <div class="main-footer_mobile-links responsive-visible-small-block hidden-non-responsive-block">
